author: ScXfjiang
message:
PR #30544: [ROCm] filter out tests with multi_gpu tags

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/30544

This PR filter out the unit tests with the `multi_gpu` tag from the single-gpu test suite. Those tests are covered in `build_tools/rocm/run_xla_multi_gpu.sh`
Copybara import of the project:

--
473e4e4ea904f2896897b6762d669b66b7476717 by scxfjiang <xuefei.jiang@amd.com>:

filter out tests with multi_gpu tags

Merging this change closes #30544

PiperOrigin-RevId: 799036079

files.patch:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ fi
 export PYTHON_BIN_PATH=`which python3`
 export TF_NEED_ROCM=1
 export ROCM_PATH=$ROCM_INSTALL_DIR
-TAGS_FILTER="gpu,requires-gpu-amd,-requires-gpu-nvidia,-requires-gpu-intel,-no_oss,-oss_excluded,-oss_serial,-no_gpu,-cuda-only,-oneapi-only"
+TAGS_FILTER="gpu,requires-gpu-amd,-multi_gpu,-requires-gpu-nvidia,-requires-gpu-intel,-no_oss,-oss_excluded,-oss_serial,-no_gpu,-cuda-only,-oneapi-only"
 UNSUPPORTED_GPU_TAGS="$(echo -requires-gpu-sm{60,70,80,86,89,90}{,-only})"
 TAGS_FILTER="${TAGS_FILTER},${UNSUPPORTED_GPU_TAGS// /,}"
